# lung 데이터 로드
```{r}

lung=survival::lung

time=lung$time
status=lung$status
sex=lung$sex

```

# OQ-survival-005
## 기대 결과(참값) 도출
```{r}

pred_model=survival::coxph(survival::Surv(time,status-1)~sex) 

pred_risk_score=stats::predict(pred_model,type="lp")
pred_res=survcomp::concordance.index(x=pred_risk_score,
                                     surv.time=time,
                                     surv.event=status-1,
                                     method="noether")
pred_res_cindex=pred_res[c("c.index","lower","upper")]

```

## 실제 결과 도출
```{r}

act_res_cindex=calc_c_index(time,status-1,sex)

```
